about_the_game:
This is a Steam version of a hit visual novel game released on the mobile reader app Love 365: Find Your Story by Voltage Inc. It is a collection of romantic, richly illustrated interactive stories with the following premise:
"Finally, in Love Again" features a work-focused heroine on a decade-long break from relationships.
For her birthday, she decides to join a match-making party and there is approached by five gorgeous, interested men! In this romantic comedy, explore interactive stories through the eyes of a woman learning how to fall in love again.
An opening movie and adventure feature have been added to the Steam release, so even players that have previously read the app version will discover more things to enjoy.

The Story:
Happy Birthday! Your present? Love, for the first time in ten years!

A successful pastry chef, you've put love on the backburner for one too many years. But a run-in with an ex and the serendipitous appearance of five younger men have put the light of love back into your life!

Characters:
Aki Fujishima "Wolf in Sheep's Clothing"
Shuichiro Momoi "Confident and Conceited"
Sosuke Kikuchi "Cool and Earnest"
Kazuki Serizawa "Sophisticated & Silver-Tongued Ex"
Kanata Tachibana "The Loveless Romance Novelist"

Contents:
Includes Main Stories from the app Love 365: Find Your Story up until "The Family Album"

content_descriptors.notes: Some stories may contain scenes of a sexual nature not suitable for all ages.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
